badges.Title: No Badges
badges.Body: {0} does not own any gym badges. Fight gym leaders using **/gymbattle** to obtain badges.

badges.Title: No Badges
badges.Body: No badges obtained for the {0} region. Fight gym leaders using **/gymbattle** to obtain badges.

changezone.Title: Zone Already Set
changezone.Body: You are already searching for Pokemon in the **__{0} Zone__**. Please choose a different zone.

changezone.Title: Zone Changed
changezone.Body: You are now set to search for {0} type Pokemon in the **__{1} Zone__**. Use this command again to go into a different zone or reset to normal.

changezone.Title: Zone Reset
changezone.Body: Your zone has been reset and you will now find every type of Pokemon. Use this command again to go into a different zone.

daily.Title: Already Claimed
daily.Body:
You have already claimed your reward for the day! Daily rewards reset at midnight UTC.

Don't forget to upvote the bot at
https://top.gg/bot/1151657435073875988

daily.Title: Daily Reward
daily.Body:
Thank you for using PokeTrainer. Here is your reward of **Pokeball x{0}** and **${1}**.
Acquired a new Daily Mission.{2}

Don't forget to upvote the bot at
https://top.gg/bot/1151657435073875988

modifyteam.Title: Cannot Modify Team
modifyteam.Body: You only have one Pokemon that is already in your team! Catch more by using the **/spawn** command and try again.

modifyteam.Title: Cannot Modify Team
modifyteam.Body: You have the minimum of one Pokemon in your team with nothing else to swap with. Specify a Pokemon when calling the command to add more Pokemon to your team.

modifyteam.Title: Invalid Pokemon
modifyteam.Body: You do not own any Pokemon with the name **{0}**.

modifyteam.Title: Cannot Modify Team
modifyteam.Body:
**{0}** is already in your team, and you have no duplicates in the box.
Select a different Pokemon, or run the command without specifying to change the team order.

myeggs.Title: No Eggs Owned
myeggs.Body: You do not own any Eggs. Obtain an egg by using the **/daily** command.

mypokemon.Title: No Pokemon Found
mypokemon.Body: Trainer does not own any Pokemon that fit the filters selected. Try again.

release.Title: Invalid Pokemon
release.Body: You do not own any Pokemon with the name {0} or this Pokemon is currently in your team.

starter.Title: Unable to Create Trainer
starter.Body: Maybe you're already adventuring? Maybe there weren't any of the Pokemon you chose? Nah, must have been something else...

usepotion.Title: No Healing
usepotion.Body: You do not own any {0}s. Please visit the **/shop** to stock up.

usepotion.Title: Health Full
usepotion.Body: {0} not used because health is already full.

usepotion.Title: Invalid Command
usepotion.Body: Please select a potion from the provided list when executing the command.
